articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Dubai's main airport to close one runway for overhaul. Details here
articles.description: The northern runway of Dubai's main airport will be shut down from May 09 till June 22 as part of their project to upgrade the airfield for ensuring better safety and efficient operations.
articles.content: The world's busiest airport by international passenger traffic, Dubai International Airport will overhaul one of its two runways for about 45 days starting May as they will be upgrading the airfield.
